HotelElement.Name: Springhill Suites by Marriott Toronto Vaughn

Description.Text: Facilities Travellers can enjoy a pleasant stay in one of the 175 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a dining area, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the holiday village. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning. A sofabed ensures a good night's sleep. There is also a safe. Additional features include a fridge, a microwave and a tea/coffee station. Internet access, a TV and WiFi add to the comfort of the holiday. The complex offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The complex offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool and an indoor pool are available to travellers. The accommodation offers a gym (for a fee) to guests. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
